translations: （用锯齿状线表示）断掉的；被清除的
抹去；删除；擦掉（字迹）；消灭（erase 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: All the phone numbers had been erased.
sentences.translation: 所有的电话号码都被抹掉了。

sentences.sentence: Parts of the recording have been erased.
Notations can be erased or saved digitally.
sentences.translation: 符号可以以数字方式删除或保存。
